title: Arabic Type Design Competition
content:
This is nice:

Linotype´s 1st Arabic Type Design Competition. Submission Deadline: October 31, 2005  
 [http://www.linotype.com/contest](http://web.archive.org/web/20060504032658/http:/www.linotype.com/contest)
author: david hamuel

comments.content: I don’t think so. I don’t know Arabic (well, I studied long long long ago…)

Nadine, I have a killer Arabic/Latin family in my head, and snippets on paper (I came up with it on the plane back home from the Beirut conference) but alas not nearly enough time to make it a reality worthy of an award.

hhp
